question:
MatchList I with List II and select the correct answer using the codes given belowthem :
List I List II
(Books) (Authors)
A. India Today 1. Valentine Chirol
B. India Unrest 2. B.G. Tilak
C. Geeta Rahasya 3. Jawaharlal Nehru
D. A Bunch of Old Letters 4. Rajni Palme Dutt
  5. Mahatma Gandhi
     A B C D
explanation:
• India Today was written by Rajni Palme Dutt. Rajni Palme Dutt is generally known as R. Palme Dutt.She was a leading journalist and theoretician in the Communist Party of Great Britain.
• Indian Unrest by Valentine Chirol is a detailed book which was written more than a century back and talks about various facets of the unrest.
• Shrimadh Bhagvad Gita Rahasya is popularly known as Gita Rahasya , is a 1915 Marathi language book authored by Indian social reformer and independence activist Bal Gangadhar Tilak while he was in prison at Mandalay, Burma.
• A Bunch of Old Letters was written by Jawaharlal Nehru.
